channel.title: Vengeance NEED HELP
channel.description:
Hey,
I got my own server but know i need help.
with My vengeance
I've seen a server (ploxagescape.no-ip.biz) If you press on the veng button you see the skull (the white one)
Then if someone hits 23 or random, he gets the hit back and you say : taste vengeance! understand?
almost like real rs you cast it , whne they hit it goes of.
Now i got the question?
Does anyone have that code?
Thanks post in reply
